page.title: 17LOCHGOILHEAD-KIRSTIN'S DAY
page.content: My name is Kirstin Mhairi MacGregor and I am 7 years old.I usually get up at 08.00,wash,dress and then have a breakfast of cereal and fruit juice.I leave for school at 08.50.I enjoy school because I meet all my friends.I enjoy playing the chanter.At playtimes I play skipping,tig,marbles,conkers, peevers(hopscotch) or the girls play the boys at football. After school I play with my Sindy dolls with my friends.We sometimes play on our bikes or roller skates or we listen to music.My favourite group is Duran Duran. On Tuesday nights I go to carpet bowls and on Thursday nights I go to junior youth club. On the nights I stay in I play games with my mum and dad.I go to bed at 20.00 and read books till 20.45. I really enjoy reading.
